content: That's great advice! I think I'll go with a combination of alphabetical and categorical organization for my records. I've got a pretty eclectic collection, so it'll be nice to have them organized in a way that makes sense. And I love the idea of creating a dedicated turntable station with built-in record storage. That'll make it super easy to access and play my favorite records. Speaking of which, I recently scored a rare pressing of The Beatles' "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band" album. Have you heard of it?
